name: opal-client-4
description: ev.io client with a host of optimizations
author: Opal

scripts.build: yarn run compile && yarn run packager
scripts.compress: terser --compress --mangle --no-annotations --toplevel --output js/index.js/ -- js/index.js/ && terser --compress --mangle --no-annotations --toplevel --output js/preload.js/ -- js/preload.js/
